content.description: Start at the jug in the middle of the face and follow the crack right and up to the horn feature at the far right and top out.
Traverse left up and arete, move out onto the face a little and finish up through the topout.
content.location: Located as a sit start on the right side of the boulder. Traverses left and tops out on the face.

content.description: Slight compression start finishing up through a reachy finish and topout.
content.location: Located on the left side of the boulder starting left on the lowest portion of the rail and right on the undercling ledge. Work your way up the crack and sidepull into the topout.

content.description: A fun simple cliqué dyno going from the starting holds of Swipe Right straight up to the topout.
content.location: located in the middle of the tinder boulder on the same starting hold as Swipe Right.

content.description: The left arete. Sit start at the far left side with a good starting foot. Work up the arete with a smear and a few small feet until you can get them in the crack. Mantle over at the high point.

Begins with a sit under the low part of the little cave. Start with feet on the lower slab, right hand in the lower slot of the crack and left on a sharp crimp. Use some technical trickery to match on the left crimp and move up left through more crimp edges to gain the angling crack and a slightly reachy topout of Shirtless Selfie.
content.location: Starts around mid boulder at the lowest part of the cave and works slightly left and up through the topout. The big jug of One Night Stand is to the right and off. The detached slab at the base is on for your feet

content.description: A long, but relatively short boulder with an obvious crack streaking across the face. Holds potential for more climbs/variations.
